CIT.TITLE: PROCESS FOR PREPARING CERAMICS, CERAMICS THUS OBTAINED AND USES THEREOF, ESPECIALLY AS A SPUTTERING TARGET
CIT.ASSIGNEE: CENTRE NATIONAL DE LA RECHERCHE SCIENTIFIQUE (Paris Cedex 16, FR); HYDRO-QUEBEC (Montreal, CA)

STAGE.CONDITIONS: glass substrate; 0.5 W/cm<sup>2</sup> power density; 1 Pa; argon-oxygen mixture; 0.2 % oxygen partial pressure
